archimate:Requirement.name: SM.1.1.8f: f) revised to take account of changing circumstances (e.g. evolving threats, new or improved control techniques, an updated business strategy, organisational changes, updates to contractual, legal and regulatory requirements, or changes to the technical infrastructure).
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
